trans-unit.source: Implements an accessibility object that <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref> classes use to adjust the designer user interface for users with disabilities.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowViewAccessibleObject"></xref> class by using the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref> to associate with the accessible object.
Gets the location and size of the accessible object.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the bounds of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowViewAccessibleObject"></xref>.
Gets a string that describes the default action of the accessible object.
Not all objects have a default action.

A string that contains a description of the default action for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowViewAccessibleObject"></xref>, or a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic) if the accessible object has no default action.
Gets a string that describes the visual appearance of the specified accessible object.
Not all accessible objects have a description.

A description of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowViewAccessibleObject"></xref> visual appearance to the user, or a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic) if the object does not have a description.
Returns the accessible child object associated with the specified index.
The zero-based index of the accessible child object to retrieve.
An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> that represents the accessible child object corresponding to the specified index.
Retrieves the number of children that belong to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowViewAccessibleObject"></xref>.
An integer that represents the number of child objects that belong to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowViewAccessibleObject"></xref>.
Gets a description of what the accessible object does or how the accessible object is used.

A string that contains the description of what the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowViewAccessibleObject"></xref> does or how it is used or a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic) if no help is defined.
Gets or sets the accessible object name.

A string that contains the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowViewAccessibleObject"></xref> name, or a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic) if the property has not been set.
Navigates to another accessible object.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation"></xref> values.
An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> that represents one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation"></xref> values.
Gets the role of the accessible object.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole"></xref> values.
<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole"></xref> is returned if no role has been specified
